text: I finally looked at my nest egg and was shocked to see the new number. Even worse that the dollars in the account will buy even less as the US currency loses its value as the "flight to safety" currency. It's not a big surprise as the US behaves like a drunk Dunning-Kruger schoolyard bully. What is amazing, if you think about it, is that we aren't having an emergency impeachment and trial to get him out of there. That could actually restore confidence of the outside world, by showing that the power in the US is more with the people than it has been for a very long time. Maybe our would-be overlords are scared too at what their idea unleashes. Even if Trump weren't so inept, eventually whoever you choose as the monarch, they're going to behave like one. Inevitable. We could have a revolution right now, fix this, and set the country on the right course. We could do it. I believe we could.
